title: Bug 29786BIDI: keyborad's left and right arrows move focus between tabs of rtloriented CTabFolder in the opposite direction.
description: Bug 29786BIDI: keyborad's left and right arrows move focus between tabs of rtloriented CTabFolder in the opposite direction.
OB: BIDI: when keyboard is used to move focus from current tab of horizontal rtloriented CTabFolder to another, left arrow causes moving to the right directionand right arrowto the left direction.
SR: BIDI: when keyboard is used to move focus from current tab of horizontal rtloriented CTabFolder to another, left arrow causes moving to the right directionand right arrowto the left direction.
